snippet: Overshadowed by Victor Cruz this season, Hakeem Nicks caught six passes for 115 yards and 2 touchdowns as the Giants knocked Atlanta out of the playoffs.
abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column holds that New York Giants receiver Hakeem Nicks stepped into spotlight with two touchdown catches in playoff victory over Atlanta Falcons.
lead_paragraph: Overshadowed by Victor Cruz this season, Hakeem Nicks caught six passes for 115 yards and 2 touchdowns as the Giants knocked Atlanta out of the playoffs.

headline.seo: No Longer Upstaged, Nicks Stars for Giants
headline.main: No Longer Upstaged, Nicks Brings Style to the Playoff Dance
headline.print_headline: No Longer Upstaged, Nicks Enjoys the Playoff Dance
